text: Doctor Julian Bashir is a character on Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. He is the doctor on the space station Deep Space Nine and also works on the spaceship The Defiant. He is played by Alexander Siddig. Dr. Bashir is said to have been really bad at everything when he was a child but then hid that his parents had him genetically engineered to be really strong, smart, and fast. Bashir kept that a secret because it was illegal. At first, Bashir doesn’t get along with Miles O’Brien, but then they become good friends. Category:Fictional Arabs Category:Fictional British people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1993 Category:Star Trek: Deep Space Nine characters Category:Star Trek: The Next Generation characters
title: Julian Bashir
